subject: Hello World
body: This is a test email.

subject: Meeting Reminder
body: Don't forget about the meeting tomorrow at 10 AM.

body: The project is on track and will be completed by next week.

subject: Vacation Request
body: I would like to request vacation days from Oct 10 to Oct 15.

body: Your support ticket has been resolved. Let us know if you need further assistance.

subject: Special Offer
body: Get 20% off on your next purchase. Offer valid until Oct 15.

body: Please review the updated company policies attached to this email.

subject: Weekly Standup
body: The weekly standup meeting is scheduled for Monday at 9 AM.

subject: System Maintenance
body: The system will be down for maintenance on Oct 10 from 1 AM to 3 AM.

subject: Follow Up
body: Just following up on the previous email. Let me know your thoughts.

subject: Event Invitation
body: You are invited to our annual company event on Oct 20.

subject: Code Review
body: Please review the latest code changes and provide feedback.

subject: Lunch Plans
body: Are you available for lunch tomorrow?

body: Please verify your account by clicking the link below.

subject: New Product Launch
body: We are excited to announce the launch of our new product.

subject: Training Session

body: The project kickoff meeting is scheduled for Oct 19 at 11 AM.

subject: Feedback Request

subject: Service Update

subject: Survey Request

subject: Code Freeze

subject: Reminder

subject: Follow-Up
